query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Outcome of creative/artistic interventions
result.description: The history of technological innovations has demonstrated that the early developers hardly could foresee the various ways the technology would be used and implemented later on To open up all possible narratives of the future we want to invite artists in residency to come and learn in our labs about our mission and give them the opportunity to either carry out an artistic interventions or develop some creative new types of applications of the projects technology
